text: Ibikorwa byiza ntabwo ari ukwerekeza gusa uburanga bwanyu ahagana iburasirazuba n’iburengera- zuba (musenga); ahubwo ukora ibyiza ni uwemera Allah, umunsi w’imperuka, abamalayika, ibitabo n’abahanuzi; akanatanga umutungo we mu nzira nziza -kandi na we awukeneye- afasha abo bafitanye isano, imfubyi, abakene, abari ku rugendo (bashiriwe) n’abasaba gufashwa, akabohoza abacakara, agahozaho amasengesho, agatanga amaturo; abuzuza isezerano ryabo igihe basezeranye, abihanganira ubukene, uburwayindetse n’igihe urugamba rwakomeye. Abo ni bo bemeye by’ukuri, kandi ni na bo batinya Allah
